issue.title: [C++] Check ARROW_WITH_OPENTELEMETRY in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15138 introduced an API modification that was missed in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15061. We should fix the broken build and add ARROW_WITH_OPENTELEMETRY=ON to CI to make sure we catch those errors.

comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15533?focusedCommentId=17486130) by Matthijs Brobbel (mbrobbel):*
Should we block this one on that PR or try to close this without OT enabled in the conda build?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15533?focusedCommentId=17486133) by David Li (lidavidm):*
